hero.title1: Created to help you pause and pray
hero.description: A simple and distraction-free tool designed to help you remember your moments of prayer and stay connected with God throughout the day.
hero.advice: No sign-ups, no ads, no tracking – just reminders to pause and pray.

features.title: Main Features
features.subtitle: Designed to help you maintain a consistent and meaningful prayer life.
features.card1-desc: Set specific times to pause your day and talk to God.
features.card2-desc: A clean interface that eliminates distractions for focus on what really matters.
features.card3-desc: The app is completely free and does not require create accounts or view ads.
features.card4-desc: Receive short messages that help you maintain a life of constant prayer.
features.card5-desc: We do not collect any information. Your times of prayer are totally private.

about.title: A Tool for Your Spiritual Life
about.description: Pray-Time was born from the desire to create a simple tool for those who want to maintain a consistent prayer life amidst busy schedules. It doesn't seek to replace your spirituality, but rather to help you remember your appointments with God.
about.detail1-desc: Each element is designed to bring you closer to Christ and strengthen your Christian faith. To help you pause, breathe, and pray.
about.detail2-desc: Your prayer time is sacred. That's why we eliminate anything that could interrupt your communion with God.
about.detail3-desc: We believe that spiritual tools should be available to all believers free of charge.

download.title: Begin Your Prayer Journey Today
download.description: Download Pray-Time for free and discover how an organized prayer life can transform your relationship with God.
download.shield: Secure download • No registration required • Privacy guaranteed
